member.summary: WatsonORM, a lightweight and easy to use object-relational mapper (ORM).

member.summary: Instantiate the object. Once constructed, call InitializeDatabase() and InitializeTable() for each table if needed.

member.summary: Dispose of the object and release background workers.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.WatsonORM.InitializeDatabase
member.summary: Initialize the database client. If the client is already initialized, it will first be disposed.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.WatsonORM.InitializeTable(System.Type)
member.summary: Create table (if it doesn't exist) for a given class.
member.param: Class for which a table should be created.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.WatsonORM.DropTable(System.Type)
member.summary: Drop table if it exists for a given class.
member.param: Class for which a table should be dropped.

member.name: M:Watson.ORM.WatsonORM.TruncateTable(System.Type)
member.summary: Truncate table if it exists for a given class.
member.param: Class for which a table should be dropped.
